entry.title: Curious about the latest happenings in DeFi regulation? Tune in to Money Legos w/ @fallow8DeFi and Blockchain Law Professor @JWVerret for an overview ...
entry.summary: Curious about the latest happenings in DeFi regulation? Tune in to Money Legos w/ @fallow8DeFi and Blockchain Law Professor @JWVerret for an overview of the recent Ooki DAO CFTC complaint, the ban on @TornadoCash, & more. 🗓Sept 27 ⏰ 4pm UTC RSVP: https://youtu.be/gkYXKUvvaNo

entry.title: Re Ready to get the ball rolling? Growth Internals data is available for every project listed on our platform: Help us by sharing any feedback or idea...
entry.summary:
Re Ready to get the ball rolling? Growth Internals data is available for every project listed on our platform:
Help us by sharing any feedback or ideas for features you would like to see. In the meantime, we'll keep building. https://www.defipulse.com/

entry.title: Re These subcategories offer a deeper look at the growth and churn rate of a project. See an increase in Monthly Users made primarily of New Users? Th...
entry.summary: Re These subcategories offer a deeper look at the growth and churn rate of a project. See an increase in Monthly Users made primarily of New Users? This might indicate an effective new feature or campaign. More Returning Users than New? This might be a loyal community.

entry.title: Re Want to see if a project is *really* growing its user base? Growth Internals provides insight into a project's trajectory by assessing the number o...
entry.summary: Re Want to see if a project is *really* growing its user base? Growth Internals provides insight into a project's trajectory by assessing the number of New, Returning, Lost, & Resurrected users over time.

entry.title: Re Introducing Growth Internals, a new data set empowering DeFi Stakeholders to see the growth and engagement trends of a protocol beyond its TVL.
entry.summary: Re Introducing Growth Internals, a new data set empowering DeFi Stakeholders to see the growth and engagement trends of a protocol beyond its TVL.

entry.title: Re As of today, DeFi Pulse has a renewed focus on bringing you more meaningful insights. Our team has already begun to rebuild our platform to enable ...
entry.summary: Re As of today, DeFi Pulse has a renewed focus on bringing you more meaningful insights. Our team has already begun to rebuild our platform to enable new metrics, features, and listings. We have a ways to go, but here's the first step.👇

entry.title: Re We've heard the feedback on our platform: "Your data is stale." "You only show one metric." "You don't have TVL for chains besides Ethereum." The r...
entry.summary: Re We've heard the feedback on our platform: "Your data is stale." "You only show one metric." "You don't have TVL for chains besides Ethereum." The relevancy of our data sucks, and we agree. It's time to do better.

entry.title: ✨The DeFi Pulse Index is the leading benchmark of the decentralized finance sector. The index is maintained by DeFi Pulse's index division @Scalara_x...
entry.summary: ✨The DeFi Pulse Index is the leading benchmark of the decentralized finance sector. The index is maintained by DeFi Pulse's index division @Scalara_xyz and is available as a single token $DPI implemented by @indexcoop. Scalara: Over the last 7 days, the DeFi Pulse Index grew 10% when measured in ETH. $DPI Best performers were @compoundfinance, @aave and @iearnfinance. Compound was even up in USD terms, despite the overall market rout.

entry.title: RT Nathan Howard: It's been a busy month or so for crypto and DeFi regulation. Join us this Tuesday as @JWVerret helps make sense of it all (in a way ...
entry.summary: RT Nathan Howard It's been a busy month or so for crypto and DeFi regulation. Join us this Tuesday as @JWVerret helps make sense of it all (in a way that isn't legal advice). DeFi Pulse 🍇: Join host @fallow8DeFi as we kick off Money Legos: Building the Financial Infrastructure of the Future. The first topic is a hot one— the future of DeFi Regulation w/ Blockchain Law Professor @JWVerret. 🗓Sept 27 ⏰ 12pm EST/4pm UTC Set a reminder: https://youtu.be/gkYXKUvvaNo
